landing.aboutMePlaceholder1: I'm Veljko Spasic, a fourth-year Software Engineering student at Singidunum University. I'm deeply passionate about crafting innovative solutions, constantly diving into the captivating world of AI, and turning creative ideas into reality. I thrive on the excitement and magic of building projects from scratch, and my curiosity often leads me into fascinating new technologies and startup ideas.
landing.aboutMePlaceholder2: One of my recent adventures involved exploring advanced AI techniques, from natural language processing to computer vision, aiming to create smarter, more intuitive systems that genuinely enhance human experiences.
landing.currentlyItem1: Playing with gravity and something that (maybe) shouldn't land.
landing.currentlyItem2: Exploring exciting startup ideas and opportunities that challenge and inspire me.
landing.currentlyItem3: Building personal projects that blend creativity, technology, and my love for the process itself.
